titles.title: Renew Through Green Jobs Act of 2009
Renew Through Green Jobs Act of 2009
To direct the Secretary of Labor to carry out a sustainability workforce training and education program.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

bill.summary: Renew Through Green Jobs Act of 2009 - Directs the Secretary of Labor to award grants to institutions of higher education for sustainability workforce training and education in industries and practices, such as: (1) clean energy; (2) green construction, retrofitting, and design; (3) green chemistry; (4) water and energy conservation; (5) recycling and waste reduction; (6) sustainable agricultural and culinary practices; (7) smart grid technology; (8) advanced vehicle technology; and (9) electric power transmission systems.
